Text.p: Turns out a lot of Raid Bosses changed a while ago. I have updated the the Raid Bosses charts add the new ones and to move old ones to Legacy

Article.Title: Enhanced Move Sets pages.
Article.Text:
The Move Sets pages have had significant enhancements:
Icons have been added to help you quickly see types and boosts.
The ability to apply filters to narrow down what you are interested in.
There is even an All Generations page. (If you don't mind the extra loading time.)
Take a look!

Article.Title: New Pokemon Chart (Beta) In The Charts Section!
Article.Text:
Interested in seeing what Pokemon there are? How about ones that aren't released in Pokemon GO yet?
Check this out!
